sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Update AIS Rule Context Labels</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', 'v_ais_result_improvement_rule_condition_builder_values');
    gr.addQuery('element=user_agent');
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue(gr.getDisplayName(), "User Context - User Agent");
        gr.update();
    }

    gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', 'v_ais_result_improvement_rule_condition_builder_values');
    gr.addQuery('element=user_agent_browser');
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue(gr.getDisplayName(), "User Context - User Browser Agent");
        gr.update();
    }

}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-01-08 20:09:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>469ea85ab72120109fa9b381de11a9bf</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update AIS Rule Context Labels</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_469ea85ab72120109fa9b381de11a9bf</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-01-08 20:09:35</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
